lines.text: function cmp with arguments a , b , x and l that returns integer
lines.code: int cmp ( int a , int b , string x , int l )

lines.text: loop incrementing a and b while a and b are both less than l
lines.code: for ( ; a < l && b < l ; a ++ , b ++ )

lines.text: set l to the length of a
for integer i = 0 to l - 1 exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < l - 1 ; i ++ )

lines.text: for integer j = i + 1 to l exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = i + 1 ; j < l ; j ++ )

lines.text: assign value of cmp ( i , j , a , l ) to the t
lines.code: t = cmp ( i , j , a , l ) ;

lines.text: if t is greater than max , set value of max to t
print max and a new line
